home.introEn:
My name is Jarek and I help bakers and enthusiasts discover real baking craft.

In my workshops I teach how to work with natural leaven, how to manage fermentation in time, and how to create French and semi-French pastries that delight with structure and aroma.

My workshops are not only technical knowledge â€“ they are practice, experience and passion for simple, natural ingredients.

Join the bakers who have introduced natural, long-fermented bread to their bakeries.
